title: 6sense
description: Account-Based Marketing software for B2B organizations.

children.value: 6sense is revolutionizing the way B2B organizations approach marketing with its powerful Account-Based Marketing software. By helping them identify, understand, and engage high-value accounts, 6sense enables businesses to refine their marketing strategies and drive revenue growth.
Want to work at 6sense? Check out their careers page:
